short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This should allow you to rank and view results from feedfact.org

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is the alpha version and will only work once you get your api key from webmaster@feedfact.org.  Once we are out of alpha we will allow everyone to use it.
